official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to provide additional assistance under the community development block grant program for priority projects.
short_title: Community Development Priority Projects Assistance Act

summary.text: Community Development Priority Projects Assistance Act - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize community development assistance for priority projects. Prescribes neighborhood eligibility requirements for such priority project grants. Authorizes FY 1988 appropriations.

titles.title: Community Development Priority Projects Assistance Act
A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to provide additional assistance under the community development block grant program for priority projects.
